mapper.select: select * from (select ceil(rownum / 7) as pageno, b.* from (select * from board_list order by bno desc) b) where pageno = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, title, content, writer) values(board_no.nextval,#{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.update: update board set bcount = bcount + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where writer like #{id} and bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_like where bno = #{bno}
